title: MANSION --- Ski & Mountain Homes -- Rich Zips: Edwards, CO 81632
text:
NOTABLE STOPS AND SHOPS

The Bookworm of Edwards

Founded in 1996 as a bookselling van that traveled up and down Vail Valley, this bookstore became a bricks-and-mortar shop a year later. It is now a beloved gathering space with a cafe.

The Gashouse

Hunting trophies and ski passes decorate this aptly named restaurant, housed in a log cabin that was formerly a gas station. It is known for its wild game and seafood, especially oysters.

Ptarmigan Sports

Locals outfit themselves for skiing, hiking, mountain biking and camping at this family-owned gear shop, one of the few places in Eagle County that sells outdoor equipment, clothing and shoes all under one roof.

Zino Ristorante

Italian cuisine is what's on the menu at this restaurant from Kevin Clair, the creator of Vail hot spot Sweet Basil, and executive chef and co-owner Nick Haley. Try a wood-fired pizza or a homemade pasta.

MEMBERSHIP TO HAVE

Several Vail Valley private clubs, such as the Vail Mountain Club or the Arrowhead Alpine Club, provide members with year-round benefits, including a range of ski-in and ski-out amenities, from heated parking to ski-valet services to on-mountain dining.

ADVICE FOR THE BUYER

Compared with Vail, Edwards has a lower altitude (leading to better breathing and sleeping for many people), a warmer temperature, and days with more sunlight for longer, says Suzi Apple, founder and owner of Gateway Real Estate in Vail Valley. Ms. Apple also notes that Edwards has more neighborhood communities and schools to choose from, and world-class golfing, too.

---

ON THE MARKET

$10.4 million

6 bedrooms, 10 bathrooms

Located on 1.6 acres within the Cordillera Valley Club, this 9,404-square-foot property has direct Sawatch Range mountain views. There is an office, gym, pool and hot tub. Agents: Aaron Rabins and Brooke Horan-Kates, Slifer Smith & Frampton Real Estate.

$6.3 million

5 bedrooms, 8 bathrooms

Less than a 10-minute drive from downtown Edwards is this 9,384- square-foot log home on 7.25 acres within the Pilgrim Downs gated community. There is a large stone fireplace in the great room. Agent: Barbara Gardner Scrivens, LIV Sotheby's International Realty.

$4.775 million

5 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms

This 6,830-square-foot house is on a 2.19-acre lot in Cordillera's The Divide neighborhood. It was built in 2007. A large primary suite has a fireplace and private deck. Agent: Jeffrey Morgan, LIV Sotheby's International Realty.
